name: Number Thumper
description:
Just simple tapping, right?? WRONG!
Find the fastest tap order to beat the clock in this logic and pattern number game!

Rules:
• For each digit shown, tap with that many fingers.
• Some digits are greater than 5. You can never tap with more than 5 fingers at once
• You can tap with a fewer number of fingers but never more
• Look for patterns to tap as quickly as possible
